OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive 6-hydroxymethylacylfulvene IV 5 minute day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 4 week minimum 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients stable respond disease completion course 2 receive additional course . Patients follow every 3 month 5 year , annually thereafter death .
